extendedInfo.description: If you are One Direction's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check One Direction's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all One Direction's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of One Direction's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page. Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :) -------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics -------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Up All Night - Take Me Home -------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Another World - Back For You - Change My Mind - C'mon, C'mon - Everything About You - Forever Young - Gotta Be You - Grenade - Heart Attack - I Should Have Kissed You - I Want - I Wish - I Would - I'm Yours - Irresistible - Kiss You - Last First Kiss - Little Things - Live While We're Young - Loved You First - Magic - Moments - More Than This - Na Na Na - Nando's Song - Nobody Compares - One Thing - One Way Or Another (Teenage Kicks)- Over Again - Rock Me - Same Mistakes - Save You Tonight - She's Not Afraid - Stand Up - Still The One - Stole My Heart - Summer Love - Taken - Teenage Dirtbag - Tell Me A Lie - They Don't Know About Us - Torn - Truly Madly Deeply - Up All Night - Use Somebody - Valerie - Vas Happenin' Boys - What Makes You Beautiful - Wonderwall - Your Math Skills Are Terrible
